pageProps.markdownHtml: Fizzy cider, CAN WE DRINK IT? Fizzy cider, YES WE CAN! Students all know it and freshers too, cider is cheap but tastes like glue. After your taste buds have gone numb, drinking more cider ain’t that dumb! Fizzy cider, CAN WE DRINK IT? Fizzy cider, YES WE CAN!

song.title: Fizzy Cider
song.lyrics:
Fizzy cider, CAN WE DRINK IT?
Fizzy cider, YES WE CAN!
Students all know it and freshers too,
cider is cheap but tastes like glue.
After your taste buds have gone numb,
drinking more cider ain’t that dumb!
Fizzy cider, CAN WE DRINK IT?
Fizzy cider, YES WE CAN!
